授業目的: 本講義は、政治学を初めて学ぶ受講生を対象に、政治学の学問背景や基本的な知識を学ぶことを目的とする。
到達目標:
以下の諸点を授業の目標として設定しています。
・政治の世界を理解する為の学問的基盤を身につける。
・クリティカルな思考と分析力を養成する。
・政治学における基礎的な専門用語とコンセプトを習得する。
授業方法:
This class will be conducted interactively via Zoom. Those who wish take this course are requested to register between April 1 and 3. After you register, please send your email address to the following email address: yukafujioka@kwansei.ac.jp Once your email address is received to the instructor, access information to Zoom will be sent to your email address. Meanwhile, for those who live outside Japan will get to watch the class video as the class via Zoom will be recorded.
この授業は同時双方向型で実施します。4/1～4/3の間に申し込みが必要な科目です。申し込み後に、yukafujioka@kwansei.ac.jpまで、履修者は自分のメールアドレスを送って下さい。講師より履修者に、ズームへのアクセス情報が送られます。尚、海外在住の履修生には、授業を録画し視聴する事が出来る様に対応します。

備考　Note
The course has the following four sets of requirements:

1. Regular class attendance and active participation in discussions.
2. One to two comment(s) or questions based on a critical analysis of the required readings in each class.
3. One media content analysis paper and presentation. Students will conduct a comparative media content analysis in which they examine various newspapers’coverage of a given topic,
write an analysis paper that demonstrates their understanding of the topic and their mastery of analytical abilities in the study of politics, and give a presentation.

Course grades will be calculated in the following manner:

Class participation 20%
One to two comments or questions in each class 30%
One media content analysis paper 20%
One media analysis presentation 30%
